name.en: Strange Days for the Task Force
name.jp: Strange Days for the Task Force

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.zh_cn: 为了阻止废校而建立的{cn对策委员会}。虽然每天都在苦撑，但学校的债务一点都没有减少的迹象。

name.en: Welcome to the Foreclosure Task Force!
name.jp: Welcome to the Foreclosure Task Force!

desc.en: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.jp: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.zh_cn: 老师读了{sn阿拜多斯}高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往{sn阿拜多斯}自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。

desc.en: After taking office for several days, Arona says that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.jp: After taking office for several days, Arona says that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.zh_cn: 在上任几天后，{cf彩奈}表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自{sn阿拜多斯}高中。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Sensei reads the letter from Abydos and knows that they are under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.jp: Sensei reads the letter from Abydos and knows that they are under attack of criminal organizations and facing problems like the ammunition running out. They thus requested help from Schale.
desc.zh_cn: 老师阅读了{sn阿拜多斯}的信，信中提到了{sn阿拜多斯}遭受暴力组织攻击、弹药耗尽等问题，并由此请求老师的帮助。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Arona briefly introduces Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and is shocked at the fact that Abydos High School is being attacked. Right away, Sensei goes on a business trip to Abydos.
desc.jp: Arona briefly introduces Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and is shocked at the fact that Abydos High School is being attacked. Right away, Sensei goes on a business trip to Abydos.
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}向老师简单介绍了一下{sn阿拜多斯}当地的情况，并对“{sn阿拜多斯}学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到{sn阿拜多斯}自治区出差。

desc.en: After reaching the Abydos district, Sensei loses his way and can't find the school.
desc.jp: After reaching the Abydos district, Sensei loses his way and can't find the school.
desc.zh_cn: 到达{sn阿拜多斯}自治区之后，老师找不到学校，迷路了。

desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.jp: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被{cf白子}救出来之后，抵达{sn阿拜多斯}高中的废校{cn对策委员会}社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击{sn阿拜多斯}高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.jp: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.zh_cn: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了{cf白子}。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.jp: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在遇见了{cf白子}之后，向{cf白子}表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。{cf白子}表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，{cf白子}背着老师到达了学校。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_cn: 击败头盔团重返{sn阿拜多斯}高中的{cn对策委员会}学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.jp: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_cn: 老师听说{sn阿拜多斯}高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是{cf茜香}却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.zh_cn: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。{cf茜香}表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，{cf野乃美}跟随前往。

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.jp: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.zh_cn: 从{cf星野}和{cf绫音}口中，老师获知了{sn阿拜多斯}欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知{sn阿拜多斯}地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cn对策委员会}学生们跟踪{cf茜香}，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是{cf茜香}依然一副没好气的样子。{cf茜香}在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_cn: 老师撞见了{cf茜香}，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。{cf茜香}躲闪着，但老师{cf步}{cf步}紧跟；{cf茜香}后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_cn: 老师带着{cn对策委员会}的其它人来到了{cf茜香}打工的拉面店，{cf茜香}大为震撼。然后，{cf茜香}带领大家就坐；之后，{cf野乃美}主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在{cf茜香}的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.jp: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.zh_cn: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上{cf茜香}，就以{et夏莱}的权限查出{cf茜香}的手机发信位置奔赴营救。

desc.en: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.jp: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.zh_cn: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到{cf茜香}的踪迹。{cf白子}立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了{cf茜香}，而之后回来的{cf星野}与老师证明了这一猜测。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.jp: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.zh_cn: 发现了自己被绑走的{cf茜香}深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，{cn对策委员会}五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了{cf茜香}。

desc.en: As Serika is sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee makes their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.jp: As Serika is sobbing in the back of the truck, the Foreclosure Committee makes their way just in time, blowing up the truck to rescue her.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf芹香}在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，{cn对策委员会}五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了{cf茜香}。

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn: 顺利从头盔团手中救出{cf茜香}的老师和{cn对策委员会}学生们。战斗后，{cf绫音}从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.jp: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然救出了{cf茜香}，但吃了一发防空导弹的{cf茜香}还是支棱不住。{cf白子}将{cf茜香}送到了医护室。{cf绫音}发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Due to the ineffectiveness of the Helmet Gang, PMC decides to hire the professionals Problem Solver 68 to finish the task.
desc.jp: Due to the ineffectiveness of the Helmet Gang, PMC decides to hire the professionals Problem Solver 68 to finish the task.
desc.zh_cn: 因为头盔团不力，PMC决定聘请“专家”{cn便利屋68}完成任务。{cn便利屋68}把{sn阿拜多斯}周围的头盔团成员给扫除了一部分。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Sensei visits Serika. Though still doesn't trust Sensei, she thanks Sensei and leaves in a hurry.
desc.jp: Sensei visits Serika. Though still doesn't trust Sensei, she thanks Sensei and leaves in a hurry.
desc.zh_cn: 老师前去看望{cf茜香}。虽然还是对老师不信任，{cf茜香}还是跟老师道了谢，而后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

desc.en: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.jp: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯{cn对策委员会}的日常会议开始，大家纷纷提出自己的对于还债的具体方法。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Hoshino points out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijack students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.jp: Hoshino points out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijack students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}指出，{sn阿拜多斯}还不起债的根本在于学生出走，因而只要把{sn其他}学校的学生劫持过来就好。被{cf绫音}否决。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Shiroko straights to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she has found out everything and in that way, they will be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it is denied by Ayane and Serika.

desc.en: As the dispute erupts, Sensei is forced to make a choice. But even Sensei's choice disappoints Ayane and makes her overturn the table angrily. Everyone is under a good lecture later.

desc.zh_cn: 众人争执不下，于是让老师做出选择。但老师的选择令{cf绫音}大失所望，怒掀桌子。之后所有人被好好说教了一番。

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.zh_cn: 众人决定带{cf绫音}去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了{cn便利屋68}全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，{cn便利屋68}只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。{cf亚瑠}跟{cn对策委员会}交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是{sn阿拜多斯}的人。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是{sn阿拜多斯}高中的学生。{cf亚瑠}被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击{sn阿拜多斯}高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.zh_cn: 多亏{cn对策委员会}学生们大展身手，才使得{cf亚瑠}和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.zh_cn: 直到与{sn阿拜多斯}一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒{cf亚瑠}他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，{cf亚瑠}最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。

desc.en: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.jp: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.zh_cn: {cn便利屋68}不出意外地完全失败。由于此时已经到了下班时间，丧失支援的{cn便利屋68}不得不撤退。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.zh_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,{cn对策委员会}学生查出，<{cn便利屋68}>的职员是{sn格黑娜}出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和{cn对策委员会}学生为了寻找{sn其他}线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.jp: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在路上遇到了{cf绫音}，{cf绫音}表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了{cn便利屋68}的资料。这时{cf无月}突然出现，邀请老师带{cn便利屋68}看看，被{cf绫音}呵斥候离开。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: Ayane finds out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they are seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with extra caution. On the other hand, Ayane thinks that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.
desc.jp: Ayane finds out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they are seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with extra caution. On the other hand, Ayane thinks that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}查清了{cn便利屋68}四人的资料，指出他们在{sn格黑娜}也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，{cf绫音}认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达黑市的{cn对策委员会}一行人遇上{sn三一}综合学园的学生，{cf日步美}。{cf日步美}是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。{cn对策委员会}一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.jp: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.zh_cn: 击败小流氓的{cf日步美}和{cn对策委员会}一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone meets Hifumi, who is being chased by some bullies at that moment, and save her for good.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone meets Hifumi, who is being chased by some bullies at that moment, and save her for good.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人被黑市的规模之大所震惊。就在这时众人遇到了被混混追赶的{cf日步美}，顺手将其救下。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Everyone asks why she is being chased, and Hifumi answers that it is because of the limited edition of the Peroro plush. It is at this moment that the gangsters come back, and everyone starts to engage.
desc.jp: Everyone asks why she is being chased, and Hifumi answers that it is because of the limited edition of the Peroro plush. It is at this moment that the gangsters come back, and everyone starts to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 众人询问{cf日步美}为何被追，后者回答是为了买佩洛洛大人的限定版周边。就在这时刚刚被打倒的混混又回来了，众人开始作战。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人要求{cf日步美}介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与{cf日步美}同行一段时间。另一方面，{cn便利屋68}的社长{cf亚瑠}，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.jp: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.zh_cn: 因为{cf日步美}对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.
desc.jp: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.
desc.zh_cn: {cn便利屋68}任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.jp: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.zh_cn: 任务失利加上资金耗尽，便利屋于是决定前去贷款。虽然{cf亚瑠}的账号已经因被{cn风纪委员会}通缉而被冻结，但{cf亚瑠}显然有自己的路子
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_cn: 巡视黑市的{cn对策委员会}一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.jp: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.zh_cn: 走了几小时的{cn对策委员会}与{cf日步美}筋疲力尽，{cf野乃美}因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Hifumi continues to introduce the situation at the Black Market and mentions about the Black Market Bank. As discussion goes, Ayane warns that the securities are approaching and everyone hides immediately.
desc.jp: Hifumi continues to introduce the situation at the Black Market and mentions about the Black Market Bank. As discussion goes, Ayane warns that the securities are approaching and everyone hides immediately.
desc.zh_cn: {cf日步美}继续向众人介绍黑市的情况，并提到了其中的黑银行。就在所有人还在讨论时，{cf绫音}突然警告黑市安保人员靠近，所有人立即藏了起来。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.jp: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.zh_cn: 众人发现自己的钱财似乎流入了黑市银行，而为了证实这一点，{cf白子}再次提起了自己抢银行的计划，希望藉由找到证明文件。众人顺便把{cf日步美}卷入其中。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的{cn对策委员会}学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在{cn对策委员会}一行人身后。{cf亚瑠}对{cn对策委员会}学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.jp: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.zh_cn: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，{cf亚瑠}最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，{sn阿拜多斯}一行人闯了进来。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. Aru is greatly amazed while standing by the side; other members are just chilling there. After the robbery, the security calls for the Black Market guards, and everyone begins to engage.
desc.jp: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. Aru is greatly amazed while standing by the side; other members are just chilling there. After the robbery, the security calls for the Black Market guards, and everyone begins to engage.
desc.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。{cf亚瑠}在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；{sn其他}成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_cn: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的{cn对策委员会}一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被{cf星野}说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被{cf亚瑠}和便利屋职员捡走。

desc.en: Defeating the guards, everyone is out.
desc.jp: Defeating the guards, everyone is out.
desc.zh_cn: 冲破黑市守卫的阻挡后，众人跑了出来。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.jp: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.jp: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.zh_cn: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。{cf茜香}与{cf野乃美}想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到{cf星野}的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，{cn对策委员会}一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_cn: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对{sn阿拜多斯}图谋不轨。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}用向{cn对策委员会}成员取得的钱攻击{sn阿拜多斯}高中。对此，{cf亚瑠}感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的{cf亚瑠}，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在{cf星野}面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}一整晚对再战{sn阿拜多斯}一行人而担忧，{cf遥香}则布置好了炸弹。{cf无月}不解为什么{cf亚瑠}不先收钱办事，{cf亚瑠}则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.jp: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.zh_cn: 中间有人提出了回到{sn格黑娜}的选项，但{cf佳世子}谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有{cn风纪委员会}，尤其是{cf阳奈}的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.jp: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在{cn对策委员会}的教室遇见了{cf野乃美}与{cf星野}。星夜有事先行离开了。{cf野乃美}随后跟老师提起了以前的{cf星野}以及她的前辈。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而{cf遥香}却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.zh_cn: 拉面店老板错认{cn便利屋68}为{sn阿拜多斯}的朋友，{cf亚瑠}突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。{cf遥香}尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.jp: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.zh_cn: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的{cf亚瑠}。{cn对策委员会}的学生没明白{cf亚瑠}的内心就指责她。结果{cf亚瑠}真的模仿坏蛋与{cn对策委员会}对立。

desc.en: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.jp: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.zh_cn: 就在便利屋和{cn对策委员会}的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。{cf绫音}说发动砲击的是{sn格黑娜}学园的{cn风纪委员会}。

desc.en: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.jp: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.zh_cn: 因为{cf亚瑠}的失语使得{cf遥香}炸掉了拉面店，就连{cf无月}也开始生气了。{cn对策委员会}赶到后发现是{cn便利屋68}，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: The Prefect Team Goes to War!
name.jp: The Prefect Team Goes to War!

desc.en: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.jp: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.zh_cn: 格黑娜{cn风纪委员会}表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而{cn对策委员会}学生却反驳说，{sn其他}学园的{cn风纪委员会}在{sn阿拜多斯}高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜{cn风纪委员会}针锋相对。

desc.en: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.jp: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.zh_cn: 格黑娜{cn风纪委员会}虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的{cn对策委员会}学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜{cn风纪委员会}的资深行政官{cf亚子}出面调解，而{cf遥香}则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。

desc.en: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.zh_cn: {cn风纪委员会}成功放倒了{cn便利屋68}一行人，但却引来了{sn阿拜多斯}一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在{sn阿拜多斯}境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
